marytts.cart.impose

Class FeatureArrayIndexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.cart.impose.FeatureArrayIndexer

  • public class FeatureArrayIndexer
extends Object
    A class branched from FeatureFileIndexer which works directly on a feature array, rather than extending FeatureFileReader.
    Author:
    Marc Schröder

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAXDEPTH
      Retrieve an array of unit features which complies with a specific target specification, according to an underlying tree, and given a stopping condition.
      static int MAXLEVEL 
      static int MINUNITS 

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • FeatureArrayIndexer

        public FeatureArrayIndexer(FeatureVector[] featureVectors,
                   FeatureDefinition featureDefinition,
                   int[] setFeatureSequence)
        Constructor which takes an array of feature vectors and launches an indexing operation according to a feature sequence constraint.
        Parameters:
        featureVectors - an array of feature vectors
        featureDefinition - a feature definition to make sense of the feature vectors
        setFeatureSequence - An array of indexes indicating the hierarchical order (or, equivalently, the sequence) of the features to use for the indexing.

      • FeatureArrayIndexer

        public FeatureArrayIndexer(FeatureVector[] featureVectors,
                   FeatureDefinition featureDefinition,
                   String[] setFeatureSequence)
        Constructor which takes an array of feature vectors and launches an indexing operation according to a feature sequence constraint.
        Parameters:
        featureVectors - an array of feature vectors
        featureDefinition - a feature definition to make sense of the feature vectors
        setFeatureSequence - An array of feature names indicating the hierarchical order (or, equivalently, the sequence) of the features to use for the indexing.

      • FeatureArrayIndexer

        public FeatureArrayIndexer(FeatureVector[] featureVectors,
                   FeatureDefinition featureDefinition)
        Constructor which loads the feature vector array but does not launch an indexing operation.
        Parameters:
        featureVectors - an array of feature vectors
        featureDefinition - a feature definition to make sense of the feature vectors

    • Method Detail

      • deepSort

        public void deepSort(int[] setFeatureSequence)
        Launches a deep sort on the array of feature vectors. This is public because it can be used to re-index the previously read feature file.
        Parameters:
        featureIdx - An array of feature indexes, indicating the sequence of features according to which the sorting should be performed.

      • deepSort

        public void deepSort(String[] setFeatureSequence)
        Launches a deep sort on the array of feature vectors. This is public because it can be used to re-index the previously read feature file.
        Parameters:
        featureIdx - An array of feature names, indicating the sequence of features according to which the sorting should be performed.

      • deepFill

        public void deepFill(MaryNode specTree)
        Fill a tree which specifies a feature hierarchy but no corresponding units.
        Parameters:
        featureIdx - An array of feature indexes, indicating the sequence of features according to which the sorting should be performed.

      • retrieve

        public FeatureFileIndexingResult retrieve(FeatureVector v)
        Retrieve an array of unit features which complies with a specific target specification, according to an underlying tree.
        Parameters:
        v - A feature vector for which to send back an array of complying unit indexes.
        Returns:
        A query result, comprising an array of feature vectors and the depth level which was actually reached.
        See Also:
        deepSort(int[]), deepFill(MaryNode)

      • retrieve

        public FeatureFileIndexingResult retrieve(FeatureVector v,
                                 int condition,
                                 int parameter)

      • getFeatureSequence

        public int[] getFeatureSequence()
        Get the feature sequence, as an information about the underlying tree structure.
        Returns:
        the feature sequence

        Get the tree
        Returns:

      • getFeatureVectors

        public FeatureVector[] getFeatureVectors(int from,
                                int to)
        Get the feature vectors from the big array according to the given indices
        Parameters:
        from - the start index
        to - the end index
        Returns:
        the feature vectors

      • getFeatureDefinition

        public FeatureDefinition getFeatureDefinition()

      • getNumberOfLeaves

        public long getNumberOfLeaves()
        Get the number of leaves.
        Returns:
        The number of leaves, or -1 if the tree has not been computed.

      • getTheoreticalNumberOfLeaves

        public long getTheoreticalNumberOfLeaves(int[] feaSeq)
        Get the theoretical number of leaves, given a feature sequence.
        Returns:
        The number of leaves, or -1 if the capacity of the long integer was blown.
